[World View]
In secret corners that humans have never noticed, figures have never stopped performing their own secret stories.
The world of figures is small. They are always sad for their masters and happy for their masters. For them, their masters' feelings are everything.
The world of figures is big. When their masters are not around, they will jump out of the window together and travel in the human world.
Yuki, who exists as a figure, has always lived happily with his partners and his master in this way.
However, the emergence of the evil figure organization destroyed the peaceful and peaceful life of the figures. A large number of figures disappeared for no reason and were forced to separate from their masters. The dreams of the figures were shattered one after another. Yuki, who was involved in this incident, made unexpected discoveries in the process of investigating the evil figure organization in depth...
In the double difficult choice between the past and the present, what choice will Yuki make? Where will the fate of the figures involved in this chaos go?
"At the moment when the memory of love disappears, I just want to do my best to remember your name."

[Game Features]
"Figure Adventure" is a trendy game with the theme of hand-made figures, which integrates card cultivation and placement and hang-up gameplay!

Original and ingenious liver-nourishing and eye-brightening, exclusive owner-intertwined plot, massive hand-made backyard matching, enjoy the collection and interaction, and easy and strategic placement fun!

· New hand-made figures with rare paint ·
Hand-made skin sets and base growth system gameplay are open, hand-made figures can be dressed up as you like, and the backyard can be placed freely, saying goodbye to the stereotyped poster girl!

· New furniture, new backyard ·
Super rare bonus backyard furniture, free to receive in activities! Medieval castles, Chinese-style martial arts halls, and high-tech airships are waiting for you to place!

· Placement and hang-up, easy liver protection ·
Hand-made figures work, the owner wins! Easy hang-up, one-click to receive rich growth resources, stop playing and say goodbye to lengthy daily tasks!

· Blind box unboxing and figure collection ·
Carefully simulated unboxing experience, with Lolita, Shota, Queen, Mecha, and Tsundere Girls! Children only make choices, adults want them all!

· Strategic formations and maximum damage ·
High degree of freedom in formations, high strategic matching! Attack or steady defense, ignite or frost? It's all up to you!
